param.name: Filter
param.label: Keep only reads that satisfy this filter

param.name: Min_mean_coverage_for_output
param.label: Specify minimum mean coverage for output from 0 onwards. For example: 10

param.name: Max_mean_coverage_for_output
param.label: Specify maximum mean coverage for output upto 1e50. For example: 100

param.name: Ignore_bases_with_lower_quality
param.label: Ignore bases with quality lower than this value

param.name: Output_combined_statistics
param.label: Output combined statistics for all samples

param.name: Mention_in_additional_column_instead_of_skipping_when_criteria_is_unsatisfied
param.label: Add additional column of y/n instead of skipping records not satisfying the criteria

macros.token: Sambamba exploits multi-core processing and dramatically reduces processing time. Sambamba is being adopted at sequencing centers, not only because of its speed, but also because of additional functionality, including coverage analysis and powerful filtering capability.
